item.title: Trump Must Immediately Build On Texas’ Successful Border Work
item.description: Texas has faithfully executed the law and played a vital role in national security -- a role the state must now maintain and reinforce.

item.title: Biden’s DOJ Digs Up New Justifications For Racial Discrimination In Military School Admissions
item.description: Instead of strictly scrutinizing the DOJ’s new justification for racial discrimination, the judge accepted it because the admirals said so.

item.title: Trans Surgeries Like Mine 40 Years Ago Were Wrong Then And Are Wrong Now
item.description: It is unimaginable to me that surgeons today perform 'gender surgeries' as treatment given what we now know.

item.title: GOP Senators Can Prove They Know What Time It Is By Confirming Trump’s Nominees Stat
item.description: By fending off left-wing attacks, putting Democrats on the defensive, and confirming Trump’s nominees, Senate Republicans will show they know what tim...

item.title: Prescribed Burns Are The Only Way For California To Avoid Another Catastrophic Fire
item.description: The solution to California's wildfires, as many fire experts argue, lies in a simple, time-tested practice: prescribed burns.
